ygData.subject: RE: OMG!  GZ finally replied
ygData.msgSnippet: Any alchemist shop - Kizzie Minntop - the honey jum lady in Rivervale.  Look in the hobbit holes (small doors - she is in the nest one down from mangler)
ygData.messageBody:
Any alchemist shop - Kizzie Minntop - the honey jum lady in Rivervale. Look
in the hobbit holes (small doors - she is in the nest one down from mangler)
Qeynos and Freeport have Alchemist shops too.

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 35th Song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk



-----Original Message-----
From: CMai [mailto:CMai@...]

Subject: RE: [eqbards] OMG! GZ finally replied


From: CMai <CMai@...>

Where can you go and buy the Pumice stone?

Thnx,
Your Friendly Rogue and Bard,
Hammerpaw and Syren Wynd


-----Original Message-----
From: Bobby [mailto:merlin26@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 10, 1999 1:23 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] OMG! GZ finally replied


From: "Bobby" <merlin26@...>

Quick note,


Egg Shaped Pumice stone: 15-18 plat
Contains 5 charges of "NULLIFY Magic" as I use these alot and my necromancer
has the spell Nullify removes TWO enchantments at a time.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
